quest.name: Corporeal Hand to Proverbial Mouth
journal:
Stigma-4 has some tasty suggestions for a superior life-form, and before you ask─no, it's not you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to the expectant Ea.
objectives: Mine [Error] at the Elysian seas.Deliver [Error] to the expectant Ea.Gather [Error] at the Elysian seas.Catch [Error] at the Elysian seas.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Last Dregs request pending. Marine foodstuffs requisitioned by Ea. Analysis suggests direct correlation to recent sensory transference involving miracle shrimp.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Scanning environment for available resources... Narrowing results by compatibility with elite non-corporeal life-forms... Filtering riffraff... <ping> Supremest foodstuffs confirmed. Initiating order distribution sequence.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Obtain appropriate quantities of superior bivalve mollusks from the Elysian seas. Specimen selection has been optimized to suit client sensibilities. Refrain from selfish ingestion and deliver to the abode of the Ea.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Obtain appropriate quantities of superior flora inhabiting the Elysian seas. Specimen has been deemed sublime and therefore inappropriate for consumption by inferior life-forms. Restrain primitive urges to gorge and deliver to the abode of the Ea.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Capture the superior arthropod native to the Elysian seas. Unit N-0598 is available to relieve you of your currency in exchange for gold salmon roe. Please note that malicious ingestion or refusal to deliver item to the abode of the Ea may result in swift termination.

dialogue.name: EA04625
dialogue.text: Well come, corporeal messenger. Have you the edible appurtenances I ordered?

dialogue.name: EA04625
dialogue.text: Fascinating. I thank you for obtaining such intriguing victuals.

dialogue.name: EA04625
dialogue.text: After hearing my brethren's account of the miracle shrimp experiment, I have taken to engaging in the semi-regular indulgence of such tantalizing stimuli.

dialogue.name: EA04625
dialogue.text: Yet, with repeated exposure comes the deadening of pleasure, as that primitive maxim suggests. “Variety is the spice of life.” Indeed, your contribution is the proverbial spice that shall allay the monotony of my endless existence. I thank you...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of Forename confirmed. Complicated emotional state detected. Requesting additional information.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text:
Voice analysis complete. Mission success. Engaging experimental exaltation sequence to restore default emotional state... Fantastically achieved, Forename! Your presence is a beacon of light to this universe!
<beep>...Detecting errors. Aborting exaltation sequence.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analysis suggests that providing sufficient variety for Ea with gustatory interest will require thousands of individual taste samples to be accumulated and codified. Recommending Forename's immediate and total recuperation of strength in light of future missions.
